name: SB Login Page
author: SB Team

sections.description:
SB Login Page is a plugin that allows user to custom WordPress login page. You can change login page logo image, update the default logo url to home page.

Required Plugin

  • SB Core

Translations

  • English
  • Vietnamese

Recommended WordPress Plugins

  • SB Banner Widget
  • SB Clean
  • SB Comment
  • SB Paginate
  • SB Post Widget
  • SB Tab Widget
  • SB TBFA
sections.installation:
Install this plugin from your WordPress site Dashboard or follow these steps below:

  1. Download plugin from WordPress Plugins directory and extract it.
  2. Upload the sb-login-page folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  3. Activate the SB Login Page plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  4. Configure the plugin by going to the SB Options menu that appears in your admin menu.
sections.faq: Please visit homepage for more details.
sections.changelog:
1.1.1

Stop using SB Plugins if current theme doesn’t support.

1.1.0

  • Update create page template functions.
  • Update function to get user page url.

1.0.9

Fix redirect bug.

1.0.8

  • Update function to check core valid version.
  • Update function for user to register and login.

1.0.7

  • Update responsive style.
  • Minify css and javascript.

1.0.6

  • Update new captcha functional.
  • Update option page.

1.0.5

  • Add hook for user can hide deactivate link.
  • Add hook for user can customize register page.

1.0.4

  • Tested up to WordPress 4.1 version.
  • Add screenshots.
  • Add custom login page.

1.0.3

Update for missing commit.

1.0.2

Update check core functions.

1.0.1

Update check core function.

1.0.0

First release of this plugin.
